metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10211 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: libyara/grammar.y in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free and application crash) via a crafted rule that is mishandled in the yr_parser_lookup_loop_variable function.

criterions.comment: yara package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.0+dfsg-9').
